Name: Exile's Circlet
Title: Noble Descent: Exile's Circlet
Desc: "Woe to thee, oh great hall with silver piled high! Why is your crown drenched in blood?"

Talent.Name: Exile's Circlet
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses an Elemental Burst:</color> All your characters on standby gain 1 $[K310]. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)

K310.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>
K310.Desc: Characters must consume {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.\nWhen characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy.
